mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.student_id, e.course_id, e.enrolled_at, s.name AS student_name, c.title AS course_title FROM enrollment e JOIN student s ON e.student_id = s.id JOIN course c ON e.course_id = c.id WHERE e.student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY e.enrolled_at DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO enrollment(student_id, course_id, enrolled_at) VALUES(#{studentId}, #{courseId}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM enrollment WHERE student_id=#{studentId} AND course_id=#{courseId}
